write to:
std.stdio.write(x')' or
std.stdio.writeln(x')' or
std.stdio.writef(format' 'x')' or
std.stdio.writefln(format' 'x')'
column4:
stderr.write(x')' or
stderr.writeln(x')' or
std.stdio.writef(stderr format' 'x')' or
std.stdio.writefln(stderr format' 'x')'

read from: x = System.in.read(); or x = new Scanner(System.in)<wbr/>.nextInt(); or x = new Scanner(System.in)<wbr/>.nextLine();
READ(* format') 'variable names' or READ(INPUT_UNIT 'format') 'variable names'''
buffer length' ACCEPT' ( # chars read ) KEY ( char )

write to: print x';' or echo x';' or printf(format'  'x');'

column4: print STDERR x';' or printf STDERR format'  'x';'

write to: x';' or Write-Output x';' or echo x

read from: let x = read_int () or let str = read_line () or Scanf.scanf format (fun x ... -> ...)
write to: print_int x or print_endline str or Printf.printf format x ...
column4: prerr_int x or prerr_endline str or Printf.eprintf format x ...

write to: printf format x ... or printfn format x ...
column4: eprintf format x ... or eprintfn format x ...
